m1.d1: Enjoy the festivities without getting soaked
Take a break from splashing water and sprinkle your loved ones with best wishes instead.

m2.d1: We usually do this at the temple to make merits, but as long as your intention is genuine, you’re golden.

location.title: Where would you like to celebrate Songkran?

a1.d1: Enjoy a jam-packed water festival at Khaosan or Silom.

a2.d1: Get blessed at temples or visit cultural attractions.

a3.d1: Kick your feet up, relax, and get a suntan.

a4.d1: No gravity, just you and me, only serenity.

person.title: Whom do you want to celebrate Songkran with?

a2.d1: Time to get together and celebrate with your family.

a3.d1: Love is in the air, but you’re in my heart.

a2.d1: Hot and sour soup with prawns from central Thailand.
